article.title: CENTECH Operates Hanscom Air Force Base Network
article.author: George I. Seffers
article.text: CENTECH Group, Falls Church, Va., has been awarded a $14,015,472 modification to a contract for operation and maintenance of the base network. The total cumulative face value of the contract is $27,236,061. Air Force Life Cycle Management Center, Hanscom Air Force Base, Mass., is the contracting activity.
